creditline: Gift of Harold and Mickey Smith
description: shield with 2 hanging pendants; pair of applied lions beneath an applied crown flank 2 tablets with applied box below; columns on either side
markings: inscriptions, in Hebrew, on tablets, inside box and on pendants
text: A shield such as this typically hangs on the outside of a torah.  The window holds a set of interchangeable plaques denoting the section of the Torah to be read for the service that day.
title: Torah shield
